TITLE: I-Gluten Free Restuarant Card
LINE1: Ndinezifo ezibizwa ngokuthi yiCeliac Disease kwaye kufuneka ndilandele ngokutya okugqithisileyo kwe-gluten.
LINE2: Ngoko ke ndingagula kakhulu ukuba ndiyidla ukutya okuqulethe iifolo okanye iinkozo zengqolowa, iirye, ibhali kunye nee-oats.
LINE3: Ngaba oku kutya kukuqulethe umgubo okanye iinkozo zengqolowa, i-rye, ibhali okanye i-oats? Ukuba awuqinisekanga ngokuphathelele ukutya, nceda undixelele.
LINE4: Ndiyakudla ukutya okunomsila, ummbila, iifatate, zonke iintlobo zemifuno kunye neziqhamo, amaqanda, ushizi, ubisi, inyama kunye nentlanzi - nje kuphela xa kungagciniwe ngqolowa, i-batter, i-breadcrumbs okanye i-sauce.
